label: Pocket Identification
description: Identify and analyze binding pockets on protein structures.

defaultInputs.name: Protein Target List
defaultInputs.tooltip: Protein targets with prepared structures for pocket analysis.

defaultOutputs.name: Score
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Druggability or binding score of the pocket.

configSchema.label: Protein 3D structure
configSchema.tooltip: 3D structure of the proteins for pocket identification
